#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <string>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <deque>
#include <assert.h>
#include <bitset>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

struct data{
    ll x;
    data(){}
    data(ll i) {x = i;}
    bool operator < (const data &a) const{
        return x > a.x;
    }
};

priority_queue <data> pq;

int main() {
    int test = 0, t, n, k;

    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--) {
        scanf("%d %d", &n, &k);

        int ext = (k-n)%(k-1);
        ext = (ext+k-1)%(k-1);

        while(!pq.empty()) pq.pop();

        for(int i = 0 ; i<ext ;i++) pq.push(data(0));

        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            data val;
            scanf("%lld", &val.x);
            pq.push(val);
        }

        ll ans = 0LL;
        while(pq.size() != 1) {
            ll tmp = 0LL;
            int lim = pq.size();
            for(int j = 0; j < min(k, lim); j++) {
                tmp += pq.top().x;
                //printf("%lld ",pq.top().x);
                pq.pop();
            }
            //printf("tmp %lld\n", tmp);
            data val;
            val.x = tmp;
            pq.push(val);
            ans += tmp;
            if(pq.size() == 1) break;
        }
        printf("Case %d: ", ++test);
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }

    return 0;
}


/*
2
11 2
3 1 4 5 2 7 6 8 3 9 4
11 3
3 1 4 5 2 7 6 8 3 9 4
*/
